original: Hålanda, Älvsb. 1. G. 36 m. Maja Cer-vin. Barn: Sven Anders f. 38, Maths Erik 41, Lars Yngve 45. — Stud :ex. i Gbg 24, fil. kand. 28, teol. kand. samt prakt. teol. prov 31, prästv. f. Gbgs stift 32. Missiv i Slöinge, Gun-narp o. Veinge, v. pastor i Halmstad 34, kommin. i Upphärad sed. 28. Var i Halmstad bl. a. led. av barnav:ndn, v. ordf. i Upphärads barnav:nd, ordf. i kyrkofullm.
translated: Hålanda, Älvsb. (Hålanda parish, Älvsborg county). First marriage in 1936 with Maja Cervin. Children: Sven Anders, born in 1938, Maths Erik, born in 1941, Lars Yngve, born in 1945. Studied at the University of Gothenburg, got a degree in Philosophy in 1928, a degree in Theology with practical examination in 1931, and was ordained as a priest in the Gothenburg diocese in 1932. Worked in Slöinge, Gunnarp, and Veinge as a minister, served as an assistant pastor in Halmstad in 1934, and served as a curate in Upphärad since 1928. In Halmstad, he was a member of the child welfare committee and had the position of vice-chairman in the child welfare committee in Upphärad. He was also the chairman of the church council.
